items.sentence: Please tell me what you think about this article.
She asked him if he was a student at this school.
She divorced him after many years of unhappiness.
Tom will most likely be the first one to show up.
Tom asked some of his friends for their opinions.
I can\'t reach any of the books on the top shelf.
I can\'t tell you how unhappy this makes me feel.
I didn\'t answer your letter, because I was busy.
There\'s a helicopter waiting for us on the roof.
Tom\'s best friend, Mary, has just turned thirty.
